name: Explosive Jake
description:
Explosive Jake - classic arсade game. Not only humans afraid of dark and deep dungeons. Our hero - a little skeleton with with unhealthy crave of explosions, which trying to escape from castle dungeons. Help him to avoid enemies and explode his way out.

What do we have here?
  • Dynamite
  • Explosions
  • Vile knights
  • Cute skeletons
  • Charming rats
  • Deadly traps
  • And even more dynamite and explosions!
